events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident that occurred at an intersection involving their vehicle and another car.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident based on descriptions mentioning vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the vehicle accident claim promptly.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the accident claim and assured the claimant of timely support.
The claimant was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and the police accident report.
The claimant provided all requested documents including accident photos, repair estimates, and police reports.
The claims team began investigation into the accident details to verify damages and liability.
Investigation concluded confirming damages consistent with a vehicle collision at the intersection.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repairs and rental car expenses was proposed to the policyholder.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the prompt service.
The claim was formally approved by the underwriting team after agreement on settlement terms.
The payment covering the repair costs was transferred to the claimantâ€™s account on the scheduled date.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after the claimant confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
The case documents and correspondence related to this vehicle accident claim were archived for future reference.
